content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information regulation requests did you receive in quarter 1 2024?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information regulation requests did you receive in quarter 4 2023?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information regulation requests did you receive in quarter 3 2023?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information regulation requests did you receive in quarter 2 2023?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information regulation requests did you receive in quarter 1 2023?
Do you hold data on freedom of information requests and environmental information regulation requests submitted to your local authority in 2022?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information regulation requests were fully or partially refused with an exemption under the freedom of information act in quarter 1 2024?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information regulation requests were fully or partially refused with an exemption under the freedom of information act in quarter 4 2023?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information regulation requests were fully or partially refused with an exemption under the freedom of information act in quarter 3 2023?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information regulation requests were fully or partially refused with an exemption under the freedom of information act in quarter 2 2023?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information regulation requests were fully or partially refused with an exemption under the freedom of information act in quarter 1 2023?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information regulation requests were responded to after the 20 working day deadline in quarter 1 2024?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information regulation requests were responded to after the 20 working day deadline in quarter 4 2023?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information regulation requests were responded to after the 20 working day deadline in quarter 3 2023?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information regulation requests were responded to after the 20 working day deadline in quarter 2 2023?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information regulation requests were responded to after the 20 working day deadline in quarter 1 2023?
How many staff do you have whose primary job is working on freedom of information and environmental information regulation requests?
How many employees are employed at your local authority?
How many employees are employed at your local authority to manage complaints submitted from the public?
How many employees are employed at your local authority to manage data breaches and data protection matters?
How many employees are employed at your local authority to manage subject access requests matters?
Yours faithfully,
Eveline Williams

Dear Eveline Williams,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Freedom of
Information data which we received on 08/07/2024.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 07/08/2024. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
Email: [1][Sheffield City Council request email]
This Email, and any attachments, may contain non-public information and is
intended solely for the individual(s) to whom it is addressed. It may
contain sensitive or protectively marked material and should be handled
accordingly. If this Email has been misdirected, please notify the author
immediately. If you are not the intended recipient you must not disclose,
distribute, copy, print or rely on any of the information contained in it
or attached, and all copies must be deleted immediately. Whilst we take
reasonable steps to try to identify any software viruses, any attachments
to this Email may nevertheless contain viruses which our anti-virus
software has failed to identify. You should therefore carry out your own
anti-virus checks before opening any documents. Sheffield City Council
will not accept any liability for damage caused by computer viruses
emanating from any attachment or other document supplied with this e-mail
References
Visible links
1. mailto:[Sheffield City Council request email]

Dear Eveline Williams,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Freedom of
Information data which we received on 08/07/2024.
Please find Sheffield City Council’s response to your request set out
below:
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information
regulation requests did you receive in quarter 1 2024?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information
regulation requests did you receive in quarter 4 2023?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information
regulation requests did you receive in quarter 3 2023?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information
regulation requests did you receive in quarter 2 2023?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information
regulation requests did you receive in quarter 1 2023?
Please see the following link: [1]Information Rights | Data Mill North
As this is information, which is accessible to the applicant by other
means, it is exempt from disclosure under section 21 of the Freedom of
Information Act 2000.
Do you hold data on freedom of information requests and environmental
information regulation requests submitted to your local authority in 2022?
Yes.
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information
regulation requests were fully or partially refused with an exemption
under the freedom of information act in quarter 1 2024?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information
regulation requests were fully or partially refused with an exemption
under the freedom of information act in quarter 4 2023?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information
regulation requests were fully or partially refused with an exemption
under the freedom of information act in quarter 3 2023?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information
regulation requests were fully or partially refused with an exemption
under the freedom of information act in quarter 2 2023?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information
regulation requests were fully or partially refused with an exemption
under the freedom of information act in quarter 1 2023?
The information you have requested is exempt from disclosure under section
12 of the Freedom of Information Act 2000. Sheffield City Council does
hold the information you have requested. However, we do not record the
information in a format that allows us to produce an electronic report of
this. Therefore, we would have to carry out a manual search of our
records. We estimate that we would need to search over 2000 records and
that it would take 2 minutes to search each record to identify the outcome
of each request. Therefore, it would take us 66 hours to collate the
information, which is more than the cost limit of 18 hours or £450
specified in the [2]Freedom of Information and Data Protection
(Appropriate Limit and Fees) Regulations 2004 (SI 2004 No. 3244).
Under section 16 of the Freedom of Information Act 2000, we have a duty to
provide advice and assistance to requesters. If you would like to narrow
down the focus of your request to a specific month, we would be happy to
process your revised request as a new request for information under the
Freedom of Information Act 2000.
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information
regulation requests were responded to after the 20-working day deadline in
quarter 1 2024?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information
regulation requests were responded to after the 20-working day deadline in
quarter 4 2023?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information
regulation requests were responded to after the 20-working day deadline in
quarter 3 2023?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information
regulation requests were responded to after the 20-working day deadline in
quarter 2 2023?
How many freedom of information requests and environmental information
regulation requests were responded to after the 20-working day deadline in
quarter 1 2023?
Please see the following link: [3]Information Rights | Data Mill North
As this is information, which is accessible to the applicant by other
means, it is exempt from disclosure under section 21 of the Freedom of
Information Act 2000.
How many staff do you have whose primary job is working on freedom of
information and environmental information regulation requests?
2.25 FTE in the central team. However, colleagues across the organisation
are involved in collating information to respond to requests.
How many employees are employed at your local authority?
8626 (Distinct headcount including employed casual staff)
How many employees are employed at your local authority to manage
complaints submitted from the public?
Please find a link to the complaints policy – which is available at the
following link:
[4]corporate_complaint_handling_policy_all_services_excluding_housing_and_repairs.pdf
(sheffield.gov.uk)
Within the introduction it states:
All employees of Sheffield City Council will carry out our commitment to
solving problems and responding positively to complaints
There is also other information regarding the Complaints team in section
4.
How many employees are employed at your local authority to manage data
breaches and data protection matters?
Data breaches and data protection matters are managed by the Information
Management team (7 employees), however, colleagues across the organisation
have responsibility in these matters.
How many employees are employed at your local authority to manage subject
access requests matters?
Subject Access requests are managed by the Information Management and SAR
team (12 employees) . However, colleagues across the organisation have
some responsibility in handling information requests, this can include
collating, redacting, and issuing responses.
If you have any queries about this response, please do not hesitate to
contact us.
The information provided in this response is available for re-use under
the terms of the Open Government Licence v3.0. The terms of the OGL can be
found [5]here. When re-using the information, Sheffield City Council
requires you to include the following attribution statement: “Contains
public sector information obtained from Sheffield City Council and
licensed under the Open Government Licence v3.0.”
If you are unhappy with the response you have received in relation to your
request, you are entitled to have this reviewed. You can ask for an
internal review by replying to this email. Internal review requests should
be submitted within 40 working days from the date of this response.
If you remain dissatisfied with the outcome of your internal review, you
can contact the Information Commissioner’s Office. Please see
[6]
https://ico.org.uk/make-a-complaint/offi...
for further details.
Kind Regards,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
Email: [7][Sheffield City Council request email]
From: FOI
Sent: Wednesday, July 10, 2024 8:53 AM
To: Eveline Williams <[FOI #1144781 email]>
Subject: Re – Freedom of Information Request – Reference – FOI / 1202891

Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council

Sheffield, S1 1UJ

or attached, and all copies must be deleted immediately. Whilst we take
